price: 212. Nolsoha adduunkan baa loo qurxiyey kuwa gaalooba, waxayna ku jeesjeesaan kuwa rumeysan, kuwase iska jira (shirkiga iyo xumaha kale), iyaga baa ka sarreyn doona oo ka kor ah (gaalada) Maalinta Qiyaamaha. Allena wuxuu arzaaqaa qofkuu doono xisaab la’aan.
arabic: زُيِّنَ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَيَسۡخَرُونَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۘ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ فَوۡقَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَرۡزُقُ مَن يَشَآءُ بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: zuyyina lilladhīna kafarū al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā wayaskharūna mina alladhīna āmanū wa-alladhīna ittaqaw fawqahum yawma al-qiyāmati wal-lahu yarzuqu man yashāu bighayri ḥisābin
